settings.heading: A private yoga lesson designed around your needs and abilities is the safest & easiest way to build a healthy yoga habit!

settings.text: You will work out together with your instructors according to a program designed JUST FOR YOU.

settings.title: [1] You need someone to understand your situation
settings.text:
The benefits of Yoga can be seen in your mind, body, and spirit with a chair or wheelchair.

Individuals with chairs / wheelchairs can benefit from yoga through simple postures and breath work.

settings.title: [2] You need to take your own path to reach your goal
settings.text: Our instructor will help you to plan your practice and leads you to your goals.

settings.title: [3] Personal feedbacks will work for you
settings.text: Our instructor will give you feedbacks for your own situations.

settings.title: [4] Safety is the most priority
settings.text: Safety practice is the fastest way to improve your practice.

settings.title: [5] Proven reputation to secure your pracitice
settings.text: You need a ceitain partner with proven record. We have been working for yoga industries 18 years and have built reputation in Asia.

settings.title: [6] 1 on 1 but affordable price
settings.text:
We recruit good quality yoga
instructors from countries with relatively low currency rate so that you can make 1 on 1 practice with daily routine.

settings.title: 6 reasons why 1 on 1 practice is good for yogis with chair / wheelchair?
Miles Maeda
settings.text: Gyrokinesis is an integrated movement system suitable for various body types, mobility levels, and movement experience. It works gently on the joints, especially the spine, which supports back, hip, and shoulder issues. It tones the internal organs and encourages heathy flow of energy though the body.

settings.title: July Lai
settings.text: "Chair Yoga and Wheel Chair Yoga is the union of body, mind and breath. Regardless you are siting, standing or lying down, as long as you are able to connect these three aspect in your yoga practice, you are doing the true yoga. Keep in mind: Empty ourselves appropriately to have enough room to spit out the old and add the new. Learn to empty ourselves to embrace everything that was given in life." by July Lai

settings.title: Column
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.heading: Instructors for Yogis with Chair / Wheelchair

settings.text: Share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, make announcements, or welcome customers to your store.
You can try our first trial session (30 min practice and 10 min service orientation) for free
